comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of long cables
- y: number of short cables

Extracted Constraints:
- 10x + 7y \leq 1000 (total amount of gold available)
- y \geq 5x (at least 5 times the number of short cables are needed than the long cables)
- x \geq 10 (at least 10 long cables need to be made)
- x \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint for long cables)
- y \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint for short cables)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 12x + 5y (profit from selling the cables)
